page.main.title: Main page
page.main.about.headline: About us
page.main.about.about-us: Liblanka is more than just a lingerie store. It is your guide to the world of luxury, comfort, and impeccable style. We offer our clients a wide range of women's and men's lingerie from leading global brands such as Acousma, Balaloum, Diorella, and Anna.
page.main.about.list.1.text: We only cooperate with trusted manufacturers who guarantee the highest quality of their products. All models in our catalog are made from the best materials using modern technologies.
page.main.about.list.2.text: At Liblanka, you will find models for every taste and body type. We offer both classic models and the latest fashion trends.
page.main.about.list.3.text: We offer our clients exclusive lingerie brands that are not available in other stores.
page.main.about.list.4.text: Our experienced consultants will help you choose a model that perfectly suits your style and size.
page.main.about.list.5.text: You can order the model you like online or visit our store in Vilnius. We offer various payment and delivery options.
